alert.note: Alert for Hall; Hamilton; Merrick (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 9:36PM CDT until May 17 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Merrick County in central Nebraska... Eastern Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 935 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over western Grand Island, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Doniphan. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 306 and 324. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
